i1.blurb: Yorick can raise Mist Walkers with his abilities. Enemies that die near Yorick will sometimes leave a grave.
description: {{sbc|The Horde:}} '''Yorick''' and the {{ai|Eulogy of the Isles|Yorick|Maiden of the Mist}} can have four total {{as|Mist Walkers|buzzword}} under their command.

{{sbc|Final Service:}} '''Yorick''' raises a {{as|Grave|buzzword2}} for every enemy [[champion]] and {{pp|3|showtype=true|12th;6th;2nd|1;7;13}} non-champion enemy that dies near him, as well as for every enemy he kills with {{ai|Last Rites|Yorick}}. '''Yorick''' can use {{ai|Awakening|Yorick}} to raise a {{as|Mist Walker|buzzword}} from a {{as|Grave|buzzword2}}.
i1.name: Shepherd of Souls

q1.blurb: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.
description: {{sbc|Active - Last Rites:}} '''Yorick's''' next [[basic attack]] within 6 seconds has {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}}, deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}, and {{tip|heal|heals}} him for {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|18|12|14|16|18|20|22|26|30|34|38|42|46|52|58|64|70|76|82|formula = 10+2 per level up to 6,+4 per level up to 12, and+6 per level up to 18}} health}}|health}}, doubled to {{as|{{sti|health|{{pp|18|24|28|32|36|40|44|52|60|68|76|84|92|104|116|128|140|152|164|formula = 20+4 per level up to 6,+8 per level up to 12, and+12 per level up to 18}} health}}|health}} if he is {{as|{{sti|health|below 50% '''maximum''' health}}}}.
If there are at least 3 {{as|Graves|buzzword2}} nearby, '''Yorick''' can cast ''{{ai|Awakening|Yorick}}'' within ''Last Rites' ''{{stil|cooldown}}.
q1.name: Last Rites
notes: * '''Yorick''' does not need to use ''Last Rites' ''enhanced attack to cast {{ai|Awakening|Yorick}}.
* ''Last Rites'' has no cast time and does not interrupt '''Yorick''' previous orders.

q2.blurb: Yorick summons Mist Walkers from the graves around him.
description: {{sbc|Active – Awakening:}} '''Yorick''' raises a {{as|Mist Walker|buzzword}} under his command from each nearby {{as|Grave|buzzword2}}, consuming the {{as|Graves|buzzword2}} he used.
This ability can only be casted if {{ai|Last Rites|Yorick}} is on {{stil|cooldown}} and there are at least 3 {{as|Graves|buzzword2}} around him.
q2.name: Awakening
notes: * '''Yorick''' does not need to use {{ais|Last Rites|Yorick}} enhanced attack to cast ''Awakening''.
* ''Awakening'' has no cast time and does not interupt '''Yorick''' previous orders.
* Mist Walkers update their stats when '''Yorick's''' stats change.

w1.blurb: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} After a 1-second delay, '''Yorick''' summons a circular wall of spirits around the target area that lasts up to 4 seconds, which enemies cannot walk through.

''Dark Procession'' can only be targeted by enemy champion basic attacks and takes 1 [[damage]] per attack, dissolving after taking enough damage. Turret shots instantly dissolve the wall regardless of its remaining health.
w1.name: Dark Procession
notes: * Allies can freely walk through ''Dark Procession''.

* ''Dark Procession'' will {{tip|airborne|knock up}} enemies away from it on-cast and trigger in-combat effects such as drawing [[turret]] aggro, applying {{ii|Elixir of Sorcery}} and {{ri|Sudden Impact}}.

e1.blurb: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yorick''' hurls a globule of Black Mist that splashes across an off-centered area, dealing {{as|15% of target's '''current''' health}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to all enemies hit, down to a minimum threshold.

Affected enemy champions and [[monster]]s are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 30% for 2 seconds, and marked for 4 seconds, during which '''Yorick''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when moving towards them.
e1.name: Mourning Mist

r1.blurb: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Yorick''' summons the ''Maiden of the Mist'' along with {{as|Mist Walkers|buzzword}}, which remain on the battlefield until she or '''Yorick''' dies.
While the ''Maiden of the Mist'' is alive, ''Eulogy of the Isles'' can be reactivated to set the ''Maiden'' free, letting her push the nearest lane until she dies.
r1.name: Eulogy of the Isles
notes: * See the ''Pets'' section below for more details about ''Maiden of the Mist'' and {{as|Mist Walkers|buzzword}}.
* The Maiden updates its stats when '''Yorick's''' stats change.
